entities.name: spiders
entities.description: Spiders are described as being the size of carthorses, eight-eyed, eight-legged, black, hairy, and gigantic.

entities.name: carthorse
entities.description: A carthorse is used as a comparison for the size of the spiders.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is described as being carried by one of the massive spiders.

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: Ron falls to the ground next to Harry and Fang.

entities.name: Fang
entities.description: Fang is described as cowering silently on the spot.

entities.name: misty domed web
entities.description: The massive spider carries Harry towards a misty domed web in the centre of the hollow.

relationships.description: One of the spiders is carrying Harry.
The spiders are closing in around Ron and Fang.
The spiders are closing in around Ron and Fang.
One of the massive spiders is carrying Harry.
Ron falls to the ground next to Harry and Fang.
